item.title: The Python Tutorial Notes - Chapter 4
item.description: Modified: July 19 2024 Control Flow Tools 6/5/2024 The while loop was seen in the previous Fibonacci Sequence example. 4.1 if Statements >>> x = int(input("Please enter an integer: ")) Please enter an integer: 42 >>> if x < 0: >>> x = 0 >>> print("Negative so now it's zero!") >>> elif x == 0: >>> print("Zero!!!") >>> elif x == 1: >>> print("UNO!!!!!") >>> else: >>> print("Nice B)") Nice B) Very basic; all you need is an if statement.
